title.value: Изучение влияния синбиотического препарата 'Синвет' на показатели продуктивности телят
Studying of synbiotic preparation 'Sinvet' influence on parameters of calf efficiency
Studying of synbiotic preparation 'Sinvet' influence on parameters of calf efficiency

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Zakrevskaya, T.V., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented the results of studies of a synbiotic preparation of Sinvet to a basis of antibiotic resistance strains of bacteria on efficiency of cultivation of calves carried out on newborn animals. Researches were spent in SPK 'Grodnenskij' in the Grodno district , and also on faculty of microbiology and epizootology of the 'Grodno State Agrarian University'. There was given the optimal dosage and frequency rate of introduction and ways of application. As a result of the carried out researches it was established that application of Sinvet improves adaptive reactions in ontogenesis, makes positive impact on albuminous, mineral composition of blood, leads to increase in live weight, daily average growth, and also to reduction of incidence and duration of a clinical course of calves.
